mapper.sql: co.opportunity_id as co_opportunity_id, co.customer_name as co_customer_name, co.company_id as co_company_id, co.dept_id as co_dept_id, co.charge_id as co_charge_id, co.remarks as co_remarks, co.name as co_name, co.sales_amount as co_sales_amount, co.complete_date as co_complete_date, co.opportunity_type as co_opportunity_type, co.opportunity_source as co_opportunity_source, co.is_deleted as co_is_deleted, co.create_by as co_create_by, co.update_by as co_update_by, co.gmt_create as co_gmt_create, co.gmt_update as co_gmt_update
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from crm_opportunity co
order by ${orderByClause}
